PrivacyPlicy.explain: GoViCare is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application designed to provide farming guidance, asset management, weather reports, monitoring support, and a public forum for farmers. By using our App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of our App.
PrivacyPlicy.RegistrationInformationTxt: To use our App, you must register by providing your name, contact details, address, and other personal information. Bank details may also be collected for specific features, such as financial planning or asset management.
PrivacyPlicy.LocationInformationTxt: We collect your location data to provide weather reports and tailored farming advice. This data is collected only when you enable location services.
PrivacyPlicy.UsageDataTxt: We collect information about your interaction with our App, including features accessed, activity logs, and preferences to improve our services and provide better recommendations. Public Forum Content: Any information shared by you in the public forum, such as issues, questions, or advice, is public and may be visible to other users. Please do not share sensitive information in this forum.
PrivacyPlicy.ToProvideServicesTxt: We use your information to deliver farming guidance, weather reports, asset management, and support features.
PrivacyPlicy.WeatherandLocationServicesTxt: Your location is used to provide accurate weather updates relevant to your area.
PrivacyPlicy.AccountManagementTxt: Your details, including bank information, are used to manage your account and facilitate asset-related services.
PrivacyPlicy.PublicForumTxt: Information shared in the forum is used to create a collaborative environment where farmers can interact and solve problems.
PrivacyPlicy.ResearchandDevelopmentTxt: We use aggregated data to improve our services, including app features and user experience.
PrivacyPlicy.InformationSharingandDisclosuretxt: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPlicy.ServiceProvidersTxt: We may share your information with trusted third-party providers who assist us in app functionality, data analysis, and weather report services.
PrivacyPlicy.LegalRequirementsTxt: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
PrivacyPlicy.AggregatedDataTxt: Non-identifiable data may be shared for research and statistical purposes to improve the agricultural industry.
PrivacyPlicy.SecurityofYourInformationTxt: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no online platform is entirely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Please notify us of any suspected security breaches.
PrivacyPlicy.YourPrivacyChoicesTxt: You can manage your privacy settings through the App, including enabling/disabling location services. You may also request data access, updates, or deletion as per applicable data protection laws.
PrivacyPlicy.ChildrensPrivacyTxt: Our App is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.
PrivacyPlicy.UpdatestothisPrivacyPolicyTxt: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The latest version will always be available in the App. Your continued use of our App after changes are made will constitute acceptance of the updated policy.

Terms&Condisions.explain: Welcome to GoViCare. By downloading or using our mobile application ("App"), you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). Please read them carefully. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App.
Terms&Condisions.EligibilityTxt: To use GoViCare, you must be at least 16 years of age and legally able to enter into these Terms.
Terms&Condisions.LicenseGrantTxt: GoViCare grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes, subject to these Terms.
Terms&Condisions.ProhibitedUsesTxt: You agree not to misuse the App, including but not limited to.
Terms&Condisions.bullet1: • Using the App for any unlawful purpose.
Terms&Condisions.bullet3: • Attempting to access unauthorized areas of the App or its data.
Terms&Condisions.bullet4: • Sharing or posting inappropriate content in the public forum.
Terms&Condisions.bullet5: • Engaging in activities that interfere with or disrupt the App's operation.
Terms&Condisions.UserRegistrationandAccountSecurityTxt: To use some features of the App, you will need to create an account. You agree to.
Terms&Condisions.bullet7: • Maintain the security of your account password.
Terms&Condisions.bullet8: • Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access or security breach.
Terms&Condisions.bullet9: • Take responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
Terms&Condisions.UserContentTxt: By posting content in the public forum, you grant GoViCare a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and share your content within the App. You are solely responsible for the content you post, including its accuracy, legality, and compliance with these Terms.
Terms&Condisions.CodeofConductTxt: Please refrain from posting inappropriate, offensive, defamatory, or unlawful content in the forum. GoViCare reserves the right to remove or moderate content that violates these Terms.
Terms&Condisions.PrivacyTxt: Your use of the App is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information. By using the App, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
Terms&Condisions.DisclaimerofWarrantiesTxt: The App is provided "as is" and "as available." GoViCare disclaims all warranties, whether express or implied, regarding the App’s operation, reliability, accuracy, or suitability for any particular purpose. We do not warrant that the App will be error-free, secure, or available at all times.
Terms&Condisions.LimitationofLiabilityTxt: To the fullest extent permitted by law, GoViCare and its affiliates, employees, or agents shall not be liable for any damages, whether direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential, arising out of your use or inability to use the App, including any reliance on advice or information provided through the App.
Terms&Condisions.ModificationstotheApp: Modifications to the App and Terms
Terms&Condisions.ModificationstotheAppTxt: GoViCare reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue the App at any time, with or without notice. We may also amend these Terms from time to time. Your continued use of the App after any changes to these Terms constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.
Terms&Condisions.TerminationTxt: GoViCare reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the App at our sole discretion, with or without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms, disrupts the App, or is harmful to other users.
Terms&Condisions.GoverningLawTxt: These Terms and your use of the App are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/Region], without regard to its conflict of laws principles.
Terms&Condisions.ContactUsTxt: For any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at

DeleteFarmer.title: Delete My Account
DeleteFarmer.confirmationMessage: Are you sure, do you want to delete your account?
DeleteFarmer.warningMessage: Once you delete your account, it cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently erased from this app. Includes your profile information, preferences, saved and any activity history.
DeleteFarmer.sadMessage: We are sad to see you go, but we understand that sometimes it’s necessary. Please take a moment to consider the consequences before proceeding.

TransactionList.Name: Name
TransactionList.This Goods Receipt Note: This Goods Receipt Note (GRN) serves as a provisional acknowledgment based on initial measurements taken by front-line staff. Final verification will be conducted at the Collection Centre. The measurement recorded at the Collection Centre shall be deemed conclusive and binding in all cases of discrepancy. The organization reserves the right to rectify any revenue impacts arising from measurement variances and shall not be liable for losses due to initial miscalculations.
